title:
Interlacing of zeros from different sequences of Meixner-Pollaczek,
  Pseudo-Jacobi and Continuous Hahn polynomials
abstract:
In this paper we consider interlacing of the zeros of polynomials from
different sequences $\{p_n\}$ and $\{g_n\}$. In our main result we consider a
mixed recurrence equation necessary for existence of a linear term $(x-A)$ so
that the $(n+1)$ zeros of $(x-A)g_n(x)$ interlace with the $n$ zeros of $p_n$.
We apply our result to Meixner-Pollaczek, Pseudo-Jacobi and Continuous Hahn
polynomials to obtain new interlacing results for the zeros of polynomials of
the same degree from different polynomial sequences.
